hero.badge: v{{version}} — Now with Claude Code Integration
hero.title: AI-Powered Task Management
hero.subtitle: Kanban by Clauding lets you run coding agents in parallel without conflicts, and perform code review through our diff tool. Now you can focus on planning and quality instead of watching terminal logs.

testimonial.quote: This completely changed how our team manages projects. The AI suggestions are incredibly accurate.
testimonial.author: Sarah Chen

cursor.installHint: Download Cursor IDE from cursor.sh to get started

copilot.requirement: Requires VS Code with GitHub Copilot extension
copilot.installHint: Install VS Code and the GitHub Copilot extension from the marketplace

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Built for developers who demand the best from their AI coding assistant

parallelExecution.title: Parallel Agent Execution
parallelExecution.description: Run multiple AI agents simultaneously to tackle complex tasks faster with coordinated parallel processing

isolatedWorkspaces.title: Isolated Workspaces
isolatedWorkspaces.description: Each task runs in its own sandboxed environment, ensuring clean separation and preventing conflicts

codeReview.title: Built-in Code Review
codeReview.description: Automatic code review with intelligent suggestions, security scanning, and best practice enforcement

mcpIntegration.title: MCP Integration
mcpIntegration.description: Connect to Model Context Protocol servers for extended capabilities and custom tool integrations

agents.title: Powered by Claude Agents
agents.subtitle: Leverage specialized AI agents to automate workflows, generate reports, and provide intelligent recommendations

agentSupport.title: Works with Your Favorite AI Agents
agentSupport.subtitle: Seamlessly integrate with the leading AI coding assistants and agents

codeSecurity.question: Is my code secure?
codeSecurity.answer: Yes, your code never leaves your local machine. Claude Code runs entirely on your device, and we only store task metadata (titles, descriptions, status) on our servers. Your source code and sensitive data remain private.

supportedAgents.question: Which AI agents are supported?
supportedAgents.answer: We support multiple AI agents including Claude Code, Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Gemini CLI, OpenAI Codex, Amp, Qwen, Opencode, and Factory Droid. Each agent can analyze your codebase, break down complex tasks, and provide intelligent suggestions.

isFree.question: Is it free to use?
isFree.answer: The Kanban board features are free to use. However, AI-powered features like task breakdown and intelligent suggestions require a subscription to your chosen AI agent provider.

parallelExecution.question: How does parallel execution work?
parallelExecution.answer: AI agents can execute multiple independent tasks simultaneously. When you have tasks without dependencies, our system automatically identifies and runs them in parallel, significantly reducing overall completion time.

vscodeSupport.question: Does it work with VS Code?
vscodeSupport.answer: Yes! Many AI agents integrate seamlessly with VS Code. You can manage tasks directly from your editor and have agents work on your codebase without leaving your development environment.

whatIsMcp.question: What is MCP?
whatIsMcp.answer: MCP (Model Context Protocol) is an open protocol that enables AI models to securely connect with external tools and data sources. It allows AI agents to interact with your development environment, databases, and other services while maintaining security boundaries.
